projects.title: Taste Events by Wolfmoon
projects.description: A professional website displaying events hosted by Taste Events by Wolfmoon.
details: Designed and developed a professional website for Taste Events by Wolfmoon, focusing on a modern look and user-friendly interface.
Integrated Firebase for backend services to provide real-time updates and efficient data management.
Built an admin platform that enables the company to quickly create, update, and manage events and site content.

projects.title: Mimair
projects.description: Mimair is a digital learning platform which utilizes AI to optimize learning.
details: Contributed as a full stack consultant at Mimair, making learning more accessible and personalized by utilizing AI models and LLMs.
Implemented new features, improved existing ones, and provided technical insights to the team from May to September 2025.
Worked on the frontend using Chakra UI and later ShadCN, and built robust backend solutions with Python, Django, and Djoser to securely manage data in our SQL database.
The app was Dockerized, with rate and request limiting to minimize costs, gamification features to boost user retention, and both graphical elements and database schemas designed and implemented.

projects.title: Mocha Movies
projects.description: A movie review website displaying comments and ratings of popular movies.
details: Developed a movie review website where users can view and post comments and ratings for popular movies.
Created a sleek and modern interface for easy navigation and a dynamic user experience.
Built the frontend with JavaScript and the backend with PHP, using a custom JSON database for storage.
Implemented user authentication, allowing users to review, comment, and save movies while connecting with friends.
Integrated external APIs for movie data and managed user-generated content in the JSON database.
This project was part of my coursework at Malmö University, highlighting my web development and UX skills.

projects.title: Studerience
projects.description: A platform displaying foreign exchange opportunities for university students.
details: Created a platform to connect university students with foreign exchange opportunities worldwide.
Designed a clean, modern UI to help students easily navigate and explore exchange programs in different countries.
Built the site using JavaScript and managed all data retrieval from a custom JSON database.
Provided detailed course information and implemented advanced filtering to enhance the student experience.
Designed and integrated SVG maps for intuitive exploration of countries and regions.
This project was part of my studies at Malmö University, demonstrating my web development and UX expertise.

projects.title: Sparkz Marketing Site
projects.description: A marketing site for Sparkz, a company specializing in digital booking solutions.
details: Developed a marketing site for Sparkz, a company specializing in digital booking solutions.
Designed a modern, professional interface to showcase the company's services and solutions.
Built the frontend with Twig and JavaScript, and the backend with PHP using the Symfony framework.
Implemented a contact form to help Sparkz engage with potential clients and generate leads.

projects.title: Online Yatzy
details: Built a multiplayer online Yatzy game that lets users play against each other in real-time on a single device.
Designed a responsive layout and intuitive UI for a seamless gaming experience.
Developed the game using native JavaScript to keep it lightweight and fast.

projects.title: Movie Community
projects.description: A simple movie review website displaying comments and ratings of popular movies.
details: This project is a movie review website that allows users to view and post comments and ratings for popular movies.
It features a basic design with the purpose of exploring the Remix framework.
The site is built using Remix for the frontend and Prisma DB for the backend, ensuring a responsive and dynamic user experience.
By fetching movies from an external API and storing user-generated content in a Prisma database, the site provides a seamless interaction for movie enthusiasts.
